entry.string: cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailreport/roles/vm_detail/files/server_ip.txt $VCenter_Hostname EOT value="$(cat /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailreport/roles/vm_detail/files/server_ip.txt | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | tr ' ' ',' | sed 's/,$//')" echo "$value" > ips.txt echo $VCentre_Username echo $VCentre_Password cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailreport/roles/vm_detail/files/hosts.txt $VCentre_Username $VCentre_Password EOT
